description: A set of product patch releases with high-level information, like version and whether the release contains security fixes.

channel-version.description: Major (or major.minor) version of the product.

latest-release.description: The version (branding) of the most recent patch release.

latest-release-date.description: The date of the most recent patch release.

security.description: Whether the release contains any CVE fixes.

release-info-uri.description: Link to detailed description of the release.
